description: The discovery of 257Sg by GSI scientists reveals new insights into nuclear stability and introduces the first seaborgium K-isomer. These findings challenge established theories of fission and may guide future efforts in synthesising superheavy elements like 256Sg and beyond.
title: Newly Detected Seaborgium-257 Offers Critical Data on Fission and Quantum Shell Effects

description: Scientists have developed a self-healing, recyclable circuit board using vitrimer and liquid metal. The material maintains conductivity after damage, reshapes under heat, and may reduce growing e-waste. Unlike traditional boards, it allows easy repair and recovery of materials, offering a sustainable solution for electronics like smartphones, laptops, and wearables, according to a study published in Advanced Materials.
title: Virginia Tech Engineers Craft Durable, Self‑Repairing, and Recyclable PCBs

description: Directed by Len Wiseman, Ballerina is an American Action-Thriller movie that is a prequel to John Wick: Chapter 4. This Ana Da Armos and Keanu Reeves starassassin-trainedrer follows Eve, who embarks on a quest to seek a revenge for her father’s death with an assassin trained group. streaming now for rent.
title: Ballerina Now Available for Rent on Amazon Prime Video, YouTube, and More

description: Blue Origin launched six tourists on its NS-33 mission, sending them past the Kármán Line and marking the 750th human in space. The 10-minute suborbital flight reached 105.2 km before landing safely in West Texas. The crew, dubbed “The Solstice 33,” experienced weightlessness and carried student postcards as part of Blue Origin’s educational outreach program.
title: Blue Origin Sends 750th Human to Space in Landmark Suborbital Flight from Texas

description: Muon Space’s FireSat project will form a 50-satellite constellation that scans the planet every 20 minutes to detect wildfires using multi-band infrared imaging. The constellation aims to support first responders and policymakers with high-resolution thermal data, bridging a critical gap in satellite-based wildfire detection. Its first satellite launched in March and has begun delivering data.
title: FireSat Protoflight Satellite to Scan Earth Every 20 Minutes for Early Wildfire Detection

description: Hedda is a Nia DaCosta directorial, where she brings the American classic stage drama to life. This movie revolves around a manipulative woman who is trapped in a loveless marriage, where she begins to manipulate the people around them. The consequences are worth watching and high in emotions.
title: Hedda OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch American Classic Drama Online?

description: A horror drama of a village, where girls disappear, and the mother and daughter who fight the demons. The mother eventually transforms herself into Maa Kaali to wipe off the forces of evil. The movie has a strong storyline packed with emotions and is also haunting at the same time. The film is set to release on Netflix after its theatrical release.
title: Maa OTT Release Date Reportedly Revealed: When and Where to Watch Kajol Starrer Movie Online After Theatrical Run?

description: Microsoft is cutting nearly 4 percent of its workforce, marking the latest layoffs as the tech giant aims to control costs while making significant investments in AI infrastructure. This follows approximately 6,000 job cuts in May. The rising expenses of scaling AI are impacting Microsoft's margins, with June quarter cloud margins expected to decline.
title: Microsoft to Cut About 4 Percent of Jobs Amid Hefty AI Bets

description: Moonwalk is a Malayalam musical drama movie which is written and directed by A.K. Vinod. The movie revolves around a group of youngsters, who are inspired by Michael Jackson, and learn break dancing. The movie is highly emotional and fun to watch. Streaming starts soon, only on JioHotstar.
title: Moonwalk OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Malayalam Musical Drama Online?

description: Directed by Iain Morris, My Oxford Year is a romance comedy Netflix original movie that revolves around Ana, played by Sophia Carson, who falls for a charming local whilst studying in Oxford to fulfil her dreams. However, their lives change once they come together. Streaming starts soon.
title: My Oxford Year OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it American Romance Drama Online?

description: NASA has introduced CODEX, a cutting-edge mini solar telescope attached to the International Space Station, which is offering groundbreaking observations of the Sun's corona. Unlike past instruments, CODEX can measure both temperature and speed of solar wind particles. This innovation aims to improve our understanding of solar weather, especially as Earth continues to experience geomagnetic storms.
title: NASA CODEX Telescope on ISS Reveals Hidden Secrets of the Sun’s Corona

description: Qualcomm announced its Snapdragon Auto Day event in India on Wednesday. This is the first time the chipmaker is hosting an automobile-focused event in the country. The event is being hosted in collaboration with Amazon Web Services (AWS) and will take place on July 30 in New Delhi. During the event, the company plans to showcase in-vehicle technology, strategic partnerships, and cross-border learnings.
title: Qualcomm Announces Snapdragon Auto Day in India, to Showcase Technology and Partnerships

description: Rocket Lab, a leader in small satellite launches, has completed its 68th Electron mission, “Symphony in the Stars,” successfully deploying a confidential satellite into orbit. The June 28, 2025 launch not only reinforces Rocket Lab’s operational efficiency but also sets a company record with two launches from the same site in under 48 hours.
title: Rocket Lab Sets Record with 'Symphony in the Stars' Launch for Confidential Client

description: Apple's foldable iPhone is said to be in the early stages of development. If all goes according to plan, it is likely to finish prototype testing by late 2025 and move into the Engineering Verification Test (EVT). As per a report, the foldable iPhone could see a launch in the second half of 2026.
title: Foldable iPhone Enters Prototype Production, May Launch in Second Half of 2026 Launch: Report

description: Rockstar Games has released a new update for Read Dead Online, adding four new Telegram missions. One of them adds undead creatures to the game, much like the Undead Nightmare expansion for Red Dead Redemption.
title: Red Dead Online Gets Surprise Update That Adds Undead Nightmare-Style Zombies and Other Missions

description: The latest Alienware Area-51 desktop features a redesigned chassis, Intel Core Ultra 9 285K CPU, up to Nvidia GeForce RTX 5090 GPU, up to 32GB DDR5 RAM, and up to 2TB Gen5 SSD. It is said to boast an advanced cooling system and connectivity options, including Thunderbolt 4 and Ethernet. The 2025 Alienware Aurora offers similar specs with up to a GeForce RTX 5080 GPU and 240mm liquid cooling. It is claimed to be 55 percent smaller than the Area-51.
title: Alienware Area-51, Alienware Aurora Desktops With Latest Intel Core Ultra CPUs Launched in India

description: Amazon Prime Day 2025 kicks off in India next week. Ahead of the two-day event, Amazon has teased some of the upcoming deals. The sale will provide up to 40 percent off on smartphones and accessories. It will be exclusive to Prime members and will also include discounts across TVs, appliances, Amazon devices, fashion, home essentials, and more. Additional offers will be available to ICICI and SBI Bank card holders.
title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale: Discounts on Electronics and Bank Offers Revealed

description: Grammarly announced its intentions to acquire Superhuman, an artificial intelligence (AI) email app, on Tuesday. The AI-powered writing and proofreading assistant highlighted that the acquisition is aimed at creating a native productivity platform which will offer integrated AI experiences, led by AI agents. The company also stated that the decision to acquire an email app was taken as emails are Grammarly’s “number-one use case.”
title: Grammarly Announces Plans to Acquire Email App Superhuman to Create Agentic Productivity Platform

description: The Honor Magic V5 features a 7.95-inch 2K inner foldable OLED screen and a 6.45-inch LTPO outer display. It is powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, with up to 16GB RAM and up to 1TB of onboard storage. The handset has a triple rear camera setup including a 64-megapixel periscope telephoto shooter and dual 20MP selfie snappers. The 16GB + 1TB variant packs a 6,100mAh battery with 66W wired and 50W wireless charging support.
title: Honor Magic V5 Launched With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, 7.95-Inch 2K Foldable Main Display

description: Vivo is yet to announce the exact launch date of the Vivo X Fold 5 in India, but ahead of it, the company has disclosed the colour options and certain specifications of the phone. The Indian variant of Vivo X Fold 5 will be available in a single colour option. The Vivo X Fold 5 Indian variant is confirmed to come with a 6,000mAh battery with 80W wired and 40W wireless fast charging support. It will run on the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC.
title: Vivo X Fold 5 Colour Options, Specifications Teased Ahead of India Launch

description: WhatsApp Business users will soon get to use two new features, Meta announced on Tuesday. The company unveiled new features for businesses at its global Conversations conference in Miami. The first feature is aimed at larger businesses that will soon be able to receive and make voice calls to customers.
title: WhatsApp Business to Soon Get AI Chatbot That Can Make Product Recommendations

description: Coros Pace 3 and several other smartwatch models are affected by a Bluetooth vulnerability, allowing nearby malicious users to access personal data, view smartphone notifications, or reset devices. The company acknowledged the flaw, and confirmed it is working on updates and patches for newer models are expected by the end of July.
title: Coros Pace 3, Other Models Affected by Flaw That Lets Malicious Users Access Data, Snoop on Notifications

description: Ferrari Amalfi was unveiled on Tuesday as the latest two-door coupe from the Italian automotive company. It is built upon the Grand Tourer concept and is said to combine high performance with everyday versatility. The Ferrari Amalfi replaces the Roma in its lineup, and comes with the HMI system featuring ADAS controls, adaptive cruise control, and voice-based commands. It is powered by a twin-turbo V8 engine which produces a maximum 640 horsepower and is mated with an eight-speed dual-clutch transmission.
title: Ferrari Amalfi Unveiled With Twin-Turbo V8 Engine, 320 KMPH Claimed Top Speed

description: Google Messages is reportedly testing a new feature: editing RCS chats sent from Android to iPhone. While iMessage and Android-to-Android RCS chats already allow edits, this cross-platform capability appears imminent. iPhone users still cannot edit RCS messages sent to Android, and this might require action on Apple's part.
title: Google Messages Lets Users Edit Cross Platform RCS Messages to iPhone Users: Report

description: Honor X9c 5G will launch in India on July 7 and go on sale via Amazon starting July 12. It will be sold in an 8GB + 256GB variant with a Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 SoC, a 108-megapixel primary rear camera with OIS and EIS support, a 6.78-inch 1.5K curved AMOLED display, and a 6,600mAh battery with 66W fast charging. The handset will have an IP65M-rated build and an SGS drop resistance certification.
title: Honor X9c 5G India Launch Set for July 7; Key Specifications and Colour Options Revealed

description: Meta is rumoured to be developing an advanced pair of smart glasses codenamed Hypernova. A tipster has now shared a leaked first look at the wearable and it does not appear to be too different from the current Ray-Ban Meta Glasses in terms of design. It is also suggested that Meta could rename the smart glasses from its current Hypernova codename to ‘Meta Celeste’.
title: Meta Hypernova Smart Glasses May Debut as ‘Meta Celeste’ With Built-in Mini Game; Design Leaked

description: NASA (The National Aeronautics and Space Administration) on Monday announced a partnership with Netflix for live streaming rocket launches, spacewalks, mission coverages, and views from the International Space Station (ISS).. Following this move, the video streaming giant will incorporate live feeds from the NASA+ service in its interface alongside the existing library of films and shows.
title: NASA Partners With Netflix for Live Streaming of Rocket Launches, Spacewalks, and More

description: The Realme 15T will launch in India in August 2025, carrying model number RMX5111 IN, according to a report. It will likely come in 8GB + 128GB, 8GB + 256GB, and 12GB + 256GB variants, with Flowing Silver, Silk Blue, and Suit Titanium colour options. Meanwhile, Realme has confirmed the upcoming launch of the Realme 15 5G and 15 Pro 5G in India, with the Pro model offering flagship features previously seen only on the Pro+ version.
title: Realme 15T India Launch Timeline, Colour Options, RAM and Storage Variants Leaked

description: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8, Galaxy Watch 8 Classic, and Galaxy Watch Ultra 2 are expected to launch next week during the Galaxy Unpacked event. A new leak suggests that the Galaxy Watch 8 series will have seven new watch faces. Details about the watch faces were reportedly spotted on the Galaxy Watch 7 Manager app.
title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Series Tipped to Come With Seven New Watch Faces

description: Vivo X200 FE could launch in India on July 14 at 12pm IST. While Vivo already confirmed the Amber Yellow and Luxe Black colourways of the phone, a new leak suggests an additional Frost Blue shade. The Vivo X200 FE is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ chipset and packs a 6,500mAh battery with 90W fast charging support.
title: Vivo X200 FE Tipped to Launch in India on July 14 in Three Colour Options

description: WWE 2K25 is coming to Nintendo Switch 2 later this month, 2K has announced. The wrestling title will release on the new console on July 23 and will be available in three editions. All editions are now up for pre-order on the Nintendo Store.
title: WWE 2K25 Launches on Nintendo Switch 2 This Month, Pre-Orders Now Live

description: Microsoft has announced the first wave games joining Xbox Game Pass in July. Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4 leads the lineup, arriving as a day one title on the service on July 11. The company also announced that its newly introduced Retro Classics collection now has over one million players.
title: Xbox Game Pass Titles for First Half of July Announced: Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4, the Ascent and More

description: Smartphones under Rs. 30,000 in India typically prioritise camera quality or sub-flagship performance, offering a balance often missing in lower price tiers. While numerous options exist, only a select few truly excel in offering both strong CPU and camera capabilities with dependable battery life. We've curated a list of the best camera-centric models available this July 2025.
title: Best Camera Smartphones Under Rs. 30,000 (July 2025): Moto Edge 60 Pro, Nothing Phone 3a Pro, Realme GT 6 and More

description: Runway, a video-focused artificial intelligence (AI) startup, unveiled its new gaming-focused offering last week. Dubbed Game World, a microsite for the platform is currently live, although users will have to wait a little before they can play the games. As per a report, the New York-based AI firm plans to start with text and image-based gaming experience, and scale it up to a full-fledged video gaming experience later this year.
title: Runway Unveils Game World, an AI Platform That Lets Users Generate Video Games

description: We’ve been hearing about the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip FE for months now. Now, a case manufacturer has allegedly listed case collections for the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and the Galaxy Z Flip FE, hinting at the moniker for the affordable clamshell foldable. The listing suggests that the FE variant could be launched in the upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE Name Appears in Alleged Third-Party Case Listing Alongside Galaxy Z Flip 7

description: The Vivo T4 Lite 5G launched in India on June 24, featuring a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, a 50-megapixel main rear camera, and a 6,000mAh battery. It is available in Prism Blue and Titanium Gold shades, priced from Rs. 9,999 for the 4GB+128GB option to Rs. 12,999 for the 8GB+256GB variant. Select bank offers can reduce prices by Rs. 500. The phone is available via Flipkart, Vivo’s e-store, and offline outlets.
title: Vivo T4 Lite 5G Now Available for Purchase in India: Price, Offers, Specifications

description: X (formerly known as Twitter) is reportedly planning to use artificial intelligence (AI) to write Community Notes on the platform. As per the report, the company has asked developers to submit custom AI agents capable of verifying the authenticity of posts and providing neutral explanations about them. This will mark a big shift in the social media platform’s fact-checking programme.
title: X to Reportedly Use AI Agents to Write Community Notes In a Bid to Scale the Programme

description: Lumio recently forayed into India’s smart TV market and has now once again teased the upcoming launch of its new product category, which is projectors. Founded by Flipkart and Xiaomi veterans, the home-grown consumer technology startup is gearing up to launch two projectors in India — the Lumio Arc 5 and Lumio Arc 7. While specifics remain under wraps, they are expected to arrive as a portable projection device and may carry an aggressive price tag.
title: Lumio Arc 5, Arc 7 Projectors Powered by Google TV to Launch in India on July 7

description: The Red Magic Astra is a gaming tablet featuring a 9.06-inch 2.4K OLED display with a 165Hz refresh rate and a 3nm Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, paired with a RedCore R3 Pro gaming chip. It supports up to 24GB of LPDDR5T RAM, 1TB of UFS 4.1 Pro storage, and runs on Redmagic OS 10.5 based on Android 15. Key features of the Astra include a 13-layer ICE-X cooling system, dual speakers with DTS:X Ultra, an 8,200mAh battery, and a side fingerprint sensor.
title: Red Magic Astra Gaming Tablet Launched With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, 8,200mAh Battery

description: Threads has finally introduced direct messages (DMs) on its platform, allowing users to communicate one-on-one without leaving the app. As per Instagram head Adam Mosseri, the feature has been a “top request” from users since the launch of Threads in 2023. It arrives with several options, including messaging controls, inbox filtering, and group messaging.
title: Threads Rolls Out DMs With Message Controls, Inbox Filters for Users Aged 18 and Above

description: Oppo Reno 14 5G series will soon make its entry into the Indian smartphone market, almost two months after its debut in China. The upcoming lineup is expected to comprise two models — the Oppo Reno 14 5G and the Reno 14 Pro 5G. Ahead of its debut, here’s everything we know about the Oppo Reno 14 5G series including its expected price in India, features, and specifications.
title: Oppo Reno 14 5G Series: Launch Date, Expected Price in India and Specifications
